title: Cylinder
description: The cylinder property indicates that the voxels conform to a cylindrical grid. Each sub-property defines the section of the cylinder that the grid actually occupies.

radius.description: The radial extents of the cylindrical grid in local space. The elements represent the minimum and maximum values respectively.

height.description: The height extents of the cylindrical grid in local space. The elements represent the minimum and maximum values respectively.

angle.description: The angular extents of the cylindrical grid in local space. Values must be in the range [-pi, pi]. The elements represent the minimum and maximum values respectively.
